title: Keyboard problem with 1 2 3 4 5 etc
body:
I don't know for some reason my 1 2 3 4 keyboards do not work anymore in game.  I can use them easily outside of game client.  I tried to reset quickcast and everything but it still doesn't work.  please help.  It really affects my game play a lot because I can't quick cast potions or wards.  

my other buttons work just fine such as Q W E R.  ONLY THE NUMBER BUTTONS don't work.

replies.body:
Hmmm... your input file that's saved server-side may be corrupt. I recommend completing a reset of this file using the steps below:

First, **log into the game** then hop into your install directory:

>  **C:\Riot Games\League of Legends**

Delete the **Config** folder, then hop back into the League client to start a custom match. Reconfigure your key bindings and test to see if they work. Let me know if this helped! ^.^
